statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); output_style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name // "default"'); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); printf "\033[42;37m %s \033[0m \033[44;97m %s \033[0m \033[92m%s\033[0m" "$model_name" "$output_style" "$current_dir"
